page.title: 16Modern Farming Methods
page.content: Farmers have been using machinery for centuries.The earliest machinery(ox pulled plough etc.)was very basic,and did not help the land owners plough very fast. Nowadays,machinery is much more efficient.This helps the farmer get his crops gathered,sprayed and watered,cows milked and seeds planted a lot faster.To gather the crops,though you would need a combine harvester (costing about Â£30,000). Very few farmers have these as they are very expensive and are only used for about two days a year,so they hire them from machinery hirers or other farmers. They did the same with helicopters for spraying crops.The only people who invest in these are the farmers with many thousands of acres.
